summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2739, for the improvement of north side of Seneca Street, from 7th Avenue to 8th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks and concrete retaining wall; by repairing the existing asphalt pavement where necessary; by reconstructing the existing curbs and sidewalks where necessary; under Ordinance No. 32498 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
